title: Yosemite National Park: Common Birds
body: Common Birds       As you travel through Yosemite National Park, you can expect to see a diversity of birds, representing about 45 families. Below are some of the frequently seen families, represented by two species observed regularly in the park. View a complete Yosemite bird checklist.                                                                                    See common wildflower illustrations of Yosemite flora by John Muir Laws--who is the author of The Laws Field Guide to the Sierra Nevada.
